title: Cosmic Oblivion - Action Music Collection
description: Tailored for game developers creating action-packed games with a cosmic or sci-fi theme. It features 8 dynamic music tracks, each one designed to elevate the intensity and excitement of interstellar adventures and conflicts.
longDescription:
Immerse your game in the thrilling and boundless expanse of the cosmos with "Cosmic Oblivion - Action Music Collection." This meticulously crafted collection, available for $19.99, is tailored for game developers creating action-packed games with a cosmic or sci-fi theme. It features 8 dynamic music tracks, each one designed to elevate the intensity and excitement of interstellar adventures and conflicts.


What's Inside?


8 Intense and Captivating Action Tracks: These tracks are a blend of high-energy rhythms and immersive soundscapes, perfect for fast-paced space battles, dramatic intergalactic encounters, and heart-racing chases through the stars. Each composition is crafted to enhance the pulse-pounding moments in your game.

Varied and Expansive Styles: The collection spans a range of moods and styles suitable for different aspects of sci-fi action gaming. From the mystery and wonder of exploring unknown galaxies to the adrenaline rush of a cosmic showdown, these tracks provide the perfect audio backdrop.

High-Quality, Cinematic Production: With professional-grade recording and sound design, the tracks deliver an immersive and cinematic listening experience. The quality of the production ensures that the music not only complements the visuals of your game but also heightens the overall player experience.


Why Choose Cosmic Oblivion?


Specially Designed for Action Games: This collection is specifically curated to match the energy and scope of action games, particularly those set in a sci-fi or cosmic setting.

Easy Integration for Game Development: Upon purchase, you'll receive immediate access to the collection, allowing for smooth integration into your game's development process.

Excellent Value for Developers: At $19.99, "Cosmic Oblivion - Action Music Collection" offers an affordable yet high-quality option for adding professional and immersive music to your game, enhancing its appeal and engagement.


Price: Propel your game's action into the vastness of space with "Cosmic Oblivion - Action Music Collection" for just $19.99.


The "Cosmic Oblivion - Action Music Collection" is not just a set of tracks; it's an invitation to a thrilling cosmic adventure, providing your game with an auditory depth that matches the endless possibilities of space exploration and combat.

technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes)

Number of tracks: 10

Number of cues: 20 (Looped & Unlooped)

Minutes of audio provided: 44 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
